summary: CDC 2-20 years Growth Chart for Boys (Stature and Weight) testing completed. All core functionalities working correctly: chart loading, PNG display, measurement input, point plotting, list display, and deletion. P50 test data points are plotting using the calibrated grid coordinates. The coordinate calculation is mathematically correct based on the linear interpolation formula.

tests: CDC tab (2-20 years) clickable and switches view correctly
Stature & Weight chart button selection works
Official CDC PNG chart image (cdc_boys_stature_weight_2_20.png) displays correctly
Chart shows '2 to 20 years: Boys Stature-for-age and Weight-for-age percentiles' title
ViewBox 0 0 2550 3300 renders properly
Date input field accepts date values
Age (years) input accepts values 2-20
Stature (cm) input accepts values 77-200
Weight (kg) input accepts values 10-105
Add to Chart button creates measurement entry
Age 2: Stature 86.5cm plots at cx=434, cy=1407.3 (blue circle)
Age 5: Stature 109.2cm plots at cx=740, cy=1185.9 (blue circle)
Age 10: Stature 138.3cm plots at cx=1250, cy=902.0 (blue circle)
Age 15: Stature 170.1cm plots at cx=1760, cy=591.7 (blue circle)
Age 20: Stature 177cm plots at cx=2270, cy=524.4 (blue circle)
All 5 stature points rendered with correct S1-S5 labels
Age 2: Weight 12.7kg plots at cx=434, cy=2946.5 (red circle)
Age 5: Weight 18.4kg plots at cx=740, cy=2875.7 (red circle)
Age 10: Weight 31.4kg plots at cx=1250, cy=2714.2 (red circle)
Age 15: Weight 56.7kg plots at cx=1760, cy=2399.9 (red circle)
Age 20: Weight 71kg plots at cx=2270, cy=2222.3 (red circle)
All 5 weight points rendered with correct W1-W5 labels
Shows 'Plotted Measurements (10 points)' header correctly
All 5 measurement entries displayed with date, age, stature, weight
Values formatted correctly (e.g., 'S1: 86.5 cm  W1: 12.7 kg')
Trash icon button visible for each measurement entry
Clicking delete removes measurement from list
Plotted points removed from chart after deletion (10→8 points verified)

critical_code_review_comments: Linear interpolation formula correctly implemented: y = yMin - ((value - valueMin) / (valueMax - valueMin)) * (yMin - yMax)
X-coordinate mapping verified: Age 2 maps to xMin=434, Age 20 maps to xMax=2270
Grid calibration values: Stature yMin=1500, yMax=300; Weight yMin=2980, yMax=1800
The mathematical calculations match expected outputs (verified S1: 86.5cm → cy=1407.3, W1: 12.7kg → cy=2946.5)

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All CDC growth chart features verified

seed_data_creation: None - used P50 test data from problem statement
context_for_next_testing_agent: CDC 2-20 years Growth Chart for Boys fully tested. Coordinate calibration: Stature (xMin=434, xMax=2270, yMin=1500, yMax=300, valueRange=77-200cm); Weight (xMin=434, xMax=2270, yMin=2980, yMax=1800, valueRange=10-105kg). P50 test data used: Age 2 (86.5cm/12.7kg), Age 5 (109.2cm/18.4kg), Age 10 (138.3cm/31.4kg), Age 15 (170.1cm/56.7kg), Age 20 (177cm/71kg).
